name: Deor Fon
description:
Deor Fon.

Set in a futuristic, vaguely European land, tamers explore the landscape, seeking out Deors. Deor Fon is a third-person, monster-catching and battling simulator, that will take full advantage of Modern game design methods so that the game is less limited by polygons and budgets.

Interact with the world, as it changes with your interactions. Complete missions and quests to obtain items and other objects so that you can better find other Deor that will help in your aid.

Battle wild Deor and Deor that trainers hold, and level up your deor so that you can be the best Deor summoner in the land!

Requires min: GTX970, 6gb RAM, Quadcore.
